name: A Pretty Face Doesn't Mean a Pretty Heart
description:
Part of 'The Skin We Live In', a series of collages based on our search for perfection in the human form. From photo filters, to diets, to cosmetic surgery, is there anything off limits? 

As we preen and pluck away at our flesh, we lose pieces of ourselves in the process while circling around for our next fix.

A PRETTY FACE DOESN'T MEAN A PRETTY HEART, just because something looks nice on the outside doesn't mean that it's nice on the inside. Why do we judge and make assumptions based on our external, superficial characteristics? Are we really that vain and self-absorbed? Like the old saying goes, "Don't judge a book by it's cover."

A collaboration between @dehiscenceart (collage) and @helldreamer00 (animation/music) 2021. Mp4 loop with audio.
